title: Carmella: A Novel
description: Have you ever witnessed a couple in an abusive relationship? Have you ever intervened? Or do you just walk away? Why do they stay together you ask yourself... There has never been a how to manual in picking Mr/Ms Wrong .. His fault ..her fault..victim...perpetrator.... Get the answers... Come to your own conclusions..you judge this sorted mess.. Can you choose a side? Someones life may depend on it..
author: Heather Justry
